reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 3/12: COUNCIL COMPOSITION -  REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM
reg_info.reg_name_text: COUNCIL COMPOSITION — REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 3/12: COUNCIL COMPOSITION -  REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF DURHAM

content.content: 1. The council of The Regional Municipality of Durham may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the method of selecting the head of the council.  O. Reg. 3/12, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The council of The Regional Municipality of Durham may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the method of selecting the head of the council.  O. Reg. 3/12, s. 1.

content.content:
2. Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 3/12, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 3/12, s. 2.
